To enable seamless screenshot capture, grant accessibility permission. This allows us to enhance your experience by offering features like easy screenshot sharing and more.

 Follow these steps:
 1. Click on GRANT PERMISSION.
 2. Select Installed apps/similar setting in Accessibility settings.

We utilize the Android Accessibility API to empower users with a seamless one-tap screenshot capture experience. This feature enhances accessibility, ensuring quick and efficient screenshot functionality.


Our app does not collect any user data through the Accessibility API. Screenshots taken using this feature are stored locally on your device, and no information is transmitted to our servers.


The Accessibility API is employed solely for the core purpose of capturing screenshots with a single tap. No user data is involved in this process, When you use this feature, the app captures and saves the screenshot directly on your device, ensuring a private and personalized experience without any data leaving your control..


In our commitment to transparency, we want to assure you that our app does not engage in any data collection using the Accessibility API. Your privacy is paramount, and we prioritize clarity in explaining the functionality of our app.


Your trust is important to us. Our app is designed to enhance your screenshot experience without compromising your privacy. Rest assured that no data is collected or transmitted when using the Accessibility API for one-tap screenshot capture.

 By clicking "Agree", you agree to allow our app to use the Android Accessibility API for the purpose of capturing screenshots with enhanced accessibility features
Thanks for choosing Screenshot to make the most of your app experience!

Danish Startup "Let there be Light" Exits Stealth Mode with $13M Seed Funding to Bring AI to General Ledgers Introduction
In a bold move set to disrupt the financial management industry, Danish startup Let there be Light has emerged from stealth mode, announcing a substantial $13 million seed funding round. This innovative company aims to integrate artificial intelligence (AI) into general ledger systems, promising to revolutionize the way businesses handle their accounting and financial reporting.
Funding and Leadership
The $13 million seed funding round was spearheaded by prominent investors, including notable venture capital firms and private equity stakeholders. The funds will be crucial for the startup’s plans to develop and scale their AI-driven solutions. This financial backing underscores investor confidence in Let there be Lights vision and technological potential.
Technological Innovation
At the heart of Let there be Lights innovation is the application of AI to general ledger management. Traditional accounting systems, which often rely on manual data entry and reconciliation, are prone to errors and inefficiencies. The company’s AI solutions are designed to automate these processes, enhancing accuracy and significantly reducing the time spent on routine tasks.
Their platform leverages machine learning algorithms to process and analyze financial data in real-time. This not only streamlines daily accounting operations but also provides deeper insights into financial performance, enabling businesses to make more informed strategic decisions.
Market Impact
The integration of AI into general ledgers is expected to have far-reaching impacts on the financial sector. By automating routine accounting tasks, companies can reallocate resources to more strategic activities. This shift can lead to improved financial oversight, faster closing cycles, and enhanced compliance with regulatory standards.
Moreover, the predictive analytics capabilities of AI can help businesses anticipate financial trends and risks, providing a competitive edge in a rapidly evolving market. This technological advancement is poised to address the long-standing challenges of error-prone manual accounting and inefficient financial reporting processes.
Future Prospects
Let there be Light is well-positioned to become a leader in the AI-driven financial technology space. With the fresh injection of capital, the company plans to expand its team, enhance its technology, and accelerate its go-to-market strategy. Initial feedback from pilot implementations has been promising, with early adopters reporting significant improvements in efficiency and accuracy.
As the company scales, it aims to forge partnerships with other technology providers and financial institutions to further embed its solutions within the broader financial ecosystem. The startup’s long-term vision includes not only transforming general ledger management but also extending AI applications to other areas of financial operations, such as budgeting, forecasting, and financial planning.
